name: One room, one bomb, one minute
name_original: One room, one bomb, one minute
description:
You control an Anti Bomb robot that has to find a bomb and get out of the room. You've one minute to do it.

You can find more about the game in the How to play section of the game.

But, basically, use the arrow keys from your keyboard, up to accelerate, down to break, left and right to steer.

Just drive over the bomb to attach it to the robot and the go out of the room.

The Space Bar is to destroy Boxes while you're against them.

Destroying too many boxes may make you lose points in the end.

Game made with full version of Construct 2 + Photoshop CS3 for the graphics and SoundStation for the music and sound
